content:
You're a proud car owner, and you should definitely highlight the extra care you've taken to maintain your vehicle.

Mentioning the new paint protection coating and regular washes in your car's description can definitely attract more buyers and potentially increase its value. Here's why:

1. **Paint protection coating**: This is a valuable feature that can appeal to buyers who want a car that looks great and is well-maintained. A paint protection coating can help protect the paint from fading, chipping, and other forms of damage, which can save the new owner money on maintenance and repairs.
2. **Regular washes**: This shows that you've taken care to keep your car clean and well-maintained, which can give buyers confidence in the overall condition of the vehicle. Regular washes can also help prevent damage from dirt, dust, and other contaminants that can accumulate on the paint and other surfaces.

When highlighting these features in your description, be sure to:

* Mention the type of paint protection coating used and when it was applied
* Specify how often you've washed the car and the type of products used
* Include photos of the car's exterior and interior to showcase its condition
* Emphasize how these features have helped maintain the car's appearance and overall value

Here's an example of how you could phrase it in your description:

"Well-maintained [Year] [Make] [Model] with a showroom shine! This car has been meticulously cared for, with regular washes every [frequency] using [type of soap/wax] to keep the paint looking like new. Additionally, a [type of paint protection coating] was applied [when] to provide an extra layer of protection against the elements. As a result, the paint is still vibrant and free of scratches or fading. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a car that looks and drives like new!"

By highlighting these features, you'll be able to attract more buyers who are looking for a well-maintained vehicle and are willing to pay a premium for it. Good luck with the sale of your car!
